```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Example 1

```{r}
draw_points = function(n) {
  list(
    x = runif(n, 0, 1),
    y = runif(n, 0 ,1)
  )
}

in_unit_circle = function(d) {
  sqrt(d$x^2 + d$y^2) <= 1
}

draw_points(1e4) |>
  in_unit_circle() |>
  sum() |>
  (\(x) (4*x /1e4))()
```

```{r}
tibble(
  n = 10^(3:6)
) |>
  mutate(
    draws = map(n, draw_points),
    n_in_unit_circle = map_int(draws, function(x) sum(in_unit_circle(x))),
    pi_approx = 4*n_in_unit_circle/n,
    pi_error = abs(pi_approx - pi)
  )
```
